intents.description: Clarify the endurance adaptation the plan must emphasize (finish resilience, pace improvement, distance capacity) so workouts align with the result.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Keep language around endurance outcomes simple and relatable (finish feeling strong, build cardio).
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Tie the desired outcome to current training structure or past event experiences.
experience_modifiers.advanced: Dial into performance thresholds or race-day execution targets.

applicability_conditions: Always relevant for endurance-influenced goals even if secondary to another focus.

intents.description: Capture the event or activity context that training sessions must reflect (e.g., trail ultra vs road 10K) to shape workout structure.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Ask broadly about the type of activity or event they care about.
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Encourage details on terrain or environmental constraints (trail vs road, pool vs open water).
experience_modifiers.advanced: Surface nuanced demands like altitude, heat, or technical segments.

applicability_conditions: Prioritize when the goal mentions races, events, or outdoor adventures.
Treat as optional if cardio is purely for general health or weight loss.

intents.description: Identify key limiters during efforts (cardio strain, muscle fatigue, recovery lag) so the plan targets the bottleneck through session design.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Discuss broad sensations like feeling winded or legs burning.
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Encourage noting when fatigue appears within sessions.
experience_modifiers.advanced: Pinpoint physiological limiters such as threshold collapse or poor fueling tolerance.

applicability_conditions: Use when the goal references past struggles or inconsistent endurance progress.
Skip if the athlete is brand new and lacks prior experience.

intents.description: Confirm access to required endurance environments or tools (pool, track, trainer) to schedule only workouts the athlete can execute.
applicability_conditions: Always relevant when endurance work requires specific venues or equipment.

intents.description: Define key race dates or checkpoints that must anchor periodization so the plan peaks at the right moment.

experience_modifiers.intermediate: Tie checkpoints to races or seasonal goals.
experience_modifiers.advanced: Reference phase timelines (base, build, peak) and taper windows.

applicability_conditions: High priority when an event is scheduled or a seasonal peak matters.
Optional for general fitness without deadlines.
